title: Kantai Collection -KanColle- Tonight, Another "Salute"!
description:
Part of the [url=https://mangadex.org/?page=search&title=Kantai%20Collection]Kantai Collection[/url] franchise. Serialized in Comptiq.  Commandant Teste, Gambier Bay, and Tashkent open a restaurant in search of a mysterious bar...

[i]Salute[/i] is the Italian equivalent of "Cheers!".

related.title: Kantai Collection -KanColle- Miiro no Alto Sax
